Text: hey how to speed up torrent

You must find your lan tcp/ip settings and set it  steady.
http://bayimg.com/FaAnaAAel

Instead of 192.16.1.237 you can set 192.168.1.x where x is 2-255 the rest like in the picture. 
You lso have port to connect others in utorrent. Go to utorrent poperties and connection. Port should be number from 10000 to 65536.

If you have lan - you can,t do redirecting by yourself. Administator must do it.

But if have router go to settings. (Most cases - open browser and type 192.168.1.1) nd find something like nat/pat and create new rule.
Ip. The same you set in lan settings,
port the same you have in utorrent,
method/protocol both or if can set both - set two seperate rules for tcp and udp
